org.teatrove.trove.file
Class Bitlist

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.file.Bitlist

public class Bitlist
extends Object

Various utilities for operating on a file at the bit level.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill

Constructor Summary

 void clear(long index)
          Clear the bit at the given index to zero.
 long countClearBits()
          Counts all the clear bits.

         throws IOException

clear

public void clear(long index)
           throws IOException
Clear the bit at the given index to zero.

Throws:
IOException

get

public boolean get(long index)
            throws IOException
Returns false if bit is clear (zero), true if bit is set (one). If bit is beyond the file buffer size, false is returned.

Throws:
IOException

findFirstSet

public long findFirstSet(long start)
                  throws IOException
Searches the bitlist for the first set bit and returns the index to it.

Parameters:
start - first index to begin search.
Throws:
IOException

findFirstSet

public long findFirstSet(long start,
                         byte[] temp)
                  throws IOException
Searches the bitlist for the first set bit and returns the index to it.

Parameters:
start - first index to begin search.
temp - temporary byte array for loading bits.
Returns:
index to first set bit or -1 if not found.
Throws:
IOException

                    throws IOException
Searches the bitlist for the first clear bit and returns the index to it.

Parameters:

temp - temporary byte array for loading bits.
